speaker: MULDER
line: Get out of here!

speaker: DOGGETT
line: Get in the car.

speaker: MULDER
line: No!

speaker: MULDER
line: Go! Go!

speaker: CUT BACK TO
line: nan

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder?

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm thinking... I'm a guilty man. I've failed in every respect. I deserve the harshest punishment for my crimes.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You don't believe that.

speaker: MULDER
line: I believe that I sat in a motel room like this with you when we first met and I tried to convince you of the truth. And in that respect, I succeeded, but... in every other way...

speaker: MULDER
line: ... I've failed.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You don't believe that, either.

speaker: MULDER
line: Mmmm.

speaker: MULDER
line: I've been chasing after monsters with a butterfly net. You heard the man - the date's set. I can't change that.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You wouldn't tell me. Not because you were afraid or broken.... but because you didn't want to accept defeat.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well, I was afraid of what knowing would do to you.

speaker: MULDER
line: I was afraid that it would crush your spirit.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why would I accept defeat? Why would I accept it, if you won't? Mulder, you say that you've failed but you only fail if you give up. And I know you -- you can't give up. It's what I saw in you when we first met. It's what made me follow you... why I'd do it all over again.

speaker: MULDER
line: And look what it's gotten you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: And what has it gotten you? Not your sister. Nothing that you've set out for. But you won't give up, even now.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You've always said that you want to believe. But believe in what Mulder? If this is the truth that you've been looking for then what is left to believe in?

speaker: MULDER
line: I want to believe that the dead are not lost to us. That they speak to us as part of something greater than us - greater than any alien force. And if you and I are powerless now, I want to believe that if we listen to what's speaking, it can give us the power to save ourselves.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Then we believe the same thing.

speaker: MULDER
line: Maybe there's hope. THE TRUTH REALLY IS OUT THERE...
